message.content:
I need to identify the line item that represents the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life - which is depreciation.

Looking at the income statement provided, I can see a line item specifically labeled "Depreciation" with a value of 45760.13 as of 2024-01-28.

This is the value I need to extract since depreciation represents the systematic allocation of an asset's cost over its useful life.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '45760.13'} }
```
